title._content: ["Old Acres," Robert Low Bacon house, Old Westbury, New York. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. ["Old Acres," Robert Low Bacon house, Old Westbury, New York. Azaleas by pool] [1922 April] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. House architecture: John Russell Pope, 1904-1910. Landscape: Martha Brookes Brown Hutcheson, 1904-1910; Virginia Murray (Mrs. Robert L.) Bacon. Other: House also known as "Oldfields." Today: House but not garden extant. On slide (handwritten): "Mrs. Rob. Bacon." Also, blind embossed stamp: "Frances B. Johnston, New York." Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16179 Call Number: LC-J717-X99- 21
